owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

workflow_id.description: The ID of the workflow. You can also pass the workflow file name as a string.

ref.description: The git reference for the workflow. The reference can be a branch or tag name.
